long_description: Balancing on a thin web above the ground is no longer limited to acrobats and daredevils. How to Slackline! Author: Scott Balcom. Softcover; 196 pages; color photographs. Globe Pequot Press; copyright 2013. Written with a head-on-your-shoulders attitude, this guide emphasizes the importance of safety in each section. Learn the nuances of rigging tricklines, longlines and highlines, as well as practicing yoga on a slackline.
short_description: Balancing on a thin web above the ground is no longer limited to acrobats and daredevils. How to Slackline! teaches you about gear selection, rigging, developing balance and managing fear.
